*Localizing and Translating Tunnelblick*

Tunnelblick is localized using [https://crowdin.com crowdin.com], a translation management site that provides free service for open source projects such as Tunnelblick.

*To join the translation team, please email jkbullard at gmail.* You can help a little or a lot, all help is welcome!

<hr>

*Working with crowdin*

Working with crowdin is self-explanatory and they have a good help function.
